rooms.description: A welcoming space incorporating local building norms, a robust design that complements Brutalist aesthetics. This area is designed to be functional and secure.
Large living room with exposed concrete structures aligning with Brutalist style, featuring a view towards the garden area for natural light and ventilation.
Integrated dining space that can be utilized as part of the joint family gatherings. Designed to be flexible in use and maintain budget-friendly materials.
A spacious bedroom with a dedicated balcony. Balcony designed with minimalist aesthetics for private outdoor seating space, ensuring Vastu compliance by avoiding direct east-west alignment.

openings.description: Reinforced concrete entrance door aligning with local safety norms and providing a secure entry point into the home.
Large window in living room ensuring natural light and ventilation. Complies with Vastu principles by maximizing southern exposure.
Durable access door to each bedroom's balcony, designed for easy accessibility while maintaining structural integrity.
Alternate entrance for utility and service use, ensuring efficient movement of supplies without interfering with main flow.

additional_details.garden_description: Large garden integrated at the rear of the property to promote green space and community interaction. Garden layout designed in accordance with local norms and Vastu principles.
